name: Seasonals
description: Adds atmospheric, animated seasonal effects like snow, falling leaves, hearts, fireworks and more. The plugin provides a settings page for configuration. If you do not have write permissions to the web folder, please also install the file-transformation plugin.
overview: Atmospheric, configurable seasonal effects for the Jellyfin web interface

versions.changelog:
### Remove ressurection PNG binaries and add README for manual uploads

### Motivation
- The environment/workflow does not accept committed binary image files, so the eight resurrection PNGs were removed and a manual upload instruction was added so the theme can still be used without bundling binaries.

### Description
- Deleted the eight images from  and added  listing the exact filenames to upload, while keeping the references in  unchanged.

### Testing
- Ran  to confirm the filenames in  match , and committed the change with  which succeeded (deletions + README added).
